description: This element is a line chart. It displays Month, FPDesc and New Hires encoded by position and color. The purpose of this chart is to show trends. The X-axis displays the values of the Month. The Y-axis displays the values of the New Hires. The legend displays the values of the FPDesc and its corresponding color. A Line represent(s) the New Hires. A Line represent(s) a different FPDesc distinguished by color.This chart has the following filters: The operation And is executed for New Hires.

title.text: New Hires by Month and FPDesc

interactions.description: By clicking on a Line you can filter the report by Month. You can hover over Line for detailed information. By clicking on a label of the x-axis you can filter the report by Month. By clicking on a label of the legend you can filter the report by FPDesc.

insight: A value of 2086 New Hires was measured for Jun and Part-Time. The highest value of 2128 was measured for Part-Time and Sep. On average Part-Time has higher values than any other category.

task: part-to-whole relationship, lookup values, find trends
description: This element is a line clustered column combo chart. It can combine lines and bars in one chart. It displays Month, New Hires and New Hires SPLY encoded by position and color. The purpose of this chart is to compare, lookup values and find trends. The X-axis displays the values of the Month. The Y-axis displays the values of the Month, New Hires and New Hires SPLY. A Line represent(s) the Month, New Hires and New Hires SPLY. A Bar represent(s) the Month, New Hires and New Hires SPLY. This chart has the following filters: The operation And is executed for New Hires. The operation And is executed for New Hires SPLY.
